meanings.definition: To go down on one or both knees
meanings.sent1: She kneeled to tie her shoelaces.
meanings.sent2: He kneeled to propose to his girlfriend.
meanings.sent3: The puppy kneeled to beg for a treat.
meanings.sent4: The knight kneeled before the king in respect.
meanings.sent5: The gymnast kneeled gracefully after her routine.

meanings.definition: To rest on one or both knees
meanings.sent1: The tired gardener kneeled to take a break.
meanings.sent2: The child kneeled to get a closer look at the bug.
meanings.sent3: The cat kneeled on the soft cushion for a nap.
meanings.sent4: The worker kneeled to inspect the floor closely.
meanings.sent5: The explorer kneeled to examine the ancient ruins.
